survey_name: Employee Satisfaction with Remote Work Technology Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to evaluate employee satisfaction with the technology tools provided for remote work and identify areas for improvement.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the technology tools provided by your company for remote work?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale to measure satisfaction levels. Ensure the scale is balanced and easy to understand.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the technology tools provided by your company for remote work?

answer_options: File sharing services (e.g., Google Drive, Dropbox)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections. Include an 'Other' option with a text field for additional tools not listed.
